mapper.select: SELECT b.item_idx , b.Title , b.uidx , b.contents , date_format(b.wdate,'%y-%m-%d-%h:%i')as wdate , u.nickName , b.Price , b.state , b.image1 FROM Board_Items b, AnnaUser u WHERE b.uidx = u.uidx and b.uidx = #{uidx} and b.item_idx not like #{item_idx} order by item_idx limit 1,4

SELECT b.item_idx , b.Title , b.uidx , b.contents , b.wdate , u.nickName , b.Price , b.image1 , b.isDel , b.state , b.keyword FROM Board_Items b, AnnaUser u WHERE b.uidx = u.uidx and b.isDel ='N' and b.uidx = #{uidx}

SELECT b.item_idx , b.Title , b.uidx , b.contents , b.wdate , b.cate_idx , b.image1 , b.image2 , b.image3 , b.image4 , b.image5 , b.image6 , b.image7 , b.image8 , b.image9 , b.image10 , u.nickName , b.Keyword , b.Price , b.offer , b.state , b.hit , b.addr_Code FROM Board_Items b , AnnaUser u WHERE b.uidx = u.uidx AND b.item_idx = #{item_idx}

select min(Price) , b.item_idx , b.Title , b.uidx , b.contents , b.wdate , b.cate_idx , image1 , u.nickname , b.Keyword , b.Price , b.offer , b.state , b.hit from Board_Items b inner join AnnaUser u on b.uidx = u.uidx where b.isDel = 'N'
AND ( b.title like concat ('%',#{searchVal},'%') or b.keyword like concat ('%',#{searchVal},'%') )
and cate_idx = #{cate_idx}
order by b.wdate desc limit 0,1
mapper.delete: delete from Neighbor where uidx = #{uidx} AND neighbor_idx = #{neighbor_idx}
mapper.select: select a.item_idx ,a.chat_host ,a.cidx ,a.contents ,a.invited ,date_format(a.cdate,'%y-%m-%d-%h:%i') ,b.nickName ,b.uidx from chat a ,AnnaUser b where a.uidx = b.uidx and chat_host = #{chat_host} and invited = #{invited} and item_idx = #{item_idx} order by cidx
select DISTINCT a.item_idx,c.nickname from chat a, AnnaUser c where a.uidx = c.uidx and a.chat_host = #{chat_host} order by a.item_idx desc
select a.item_idx,c.nickname ,a.contents, a.uidx,date_format(a.cdate,'%y-%m-%d-%h:%i') from chat a, AnnaUser c where a.uidx = c.uidx and item_idx = #{item_idx} order by a.cdate desc
select count(*) from Wish_list where item_idx = #{item_idx} and uidx = #{uidx}

select b.item_idx , b.Title , b.uidx , b.contents , b.wdate , b.cate_idx , b.image1 , b.image2 , b.image3 , b.image4 , b.image5 , b.image6 , b.image7 , b.image8 , b.image9 , b.image10 , (select nickName from AnnaUser where uidx = b.uidx) as nickName , b.Keyword , b.Price , b.offer , b.state from Board_Items b where b.item_idx in (select item_idx from Wish_list where uidx = #{uidx})
mapper.delete: delete from Wish_list where item_idx = #{item_idx} and uidx = #{uidx}
mapper.select: select count(uidx) from Wish_list where item_idx = #{item_idx}
mapper.update: update Board_Items set hit = hit+1 where item_idx = #{item_idx}
mapper.select: select hit from Board_Items where item_idx = #{item_idx}
select black_idx, (select nickname from AnnaUser where uidx = black_idx)as nickName from blackList where uidx = #{uidx}
mapper.update: update Board_Items set state = #{state} where item_idx = #{item_idx}
update Board_Items set wdate = now() where item_idx = #{item_idx}
